mapper.select: SELECT i.model_name , o.order_id FROM orders o JOIN payment p ON o.order_id = p.order_id JOIN delivery d ON o.order_id = d.order_id JOIN information i ON o.car_info_id = i.car_info_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND p.payment_status = '결제완료' AND d.delivery_status = '배송완료' AND o.order_status = '주문완료' AND o.refund_status is Null ORDER BY order_completed_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO refund( refund_reason, refund_completed_at, order_id, refund_status ) VALUES ( #{refundReason}, NOW(), #{orderId}, #{refundStatus} )
